title: Pumpkin Scented Candle
summaries: The Pumpkin Scented Candle is a Master Mode-exclusive light pet-summoning item dropped by Pumpking with a 1/8 (12.5%) to 1/4 (25%) chance. When used or equipped, it summons a miniature Pumpking named Jack 'O Lantern.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a possessed Jack 'O Lantern
'The flame cannot be put out!'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
